item.title: Emily Spence Joins Vice Media Group as Chief Communications Officer
item.description: Vice Media Group has named Emily Spence as Chief Communications Officer. Spence will oversee Vice’s global communications strategy across the company’s portfolio including Vice Studios, Vice Commercia
